content: the **color salad baby blanket** is a simple granny square blanket made using completely solid blocks without any holes or gaps *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** 4 0-mm g/6 us 8 uk crochet hook dk 3 light weight yarn tapestry needle **yarn** i used hobbii amigo 191 yds / 175 m per 50 g in the following colors and amounts **a** dark magenta a52 382 yds 350 m *2 balls* **b** lavender a59 382 yds 350 m *2 balls* **c** delicate rose a47 382 yds 350 m *2 balls* **d** vintage pink a49 191 yds 175 m *1 ball* **e** light lilac a48 191 yds 175 m *1 ball* **f** light peach a46 191 yds 175 m *1 ball* **g** ecru a02 382 yds 350 m *2 balls* **size** **stroller/baby** 33 84 cm by 37 5 95 cm **crib** 37 5 95 cm by 43 109 cm **gauge** 4 rounds of a solid square in 4 10 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
